name: Street Food & Amazing Places in Ho Chi Minh City & neighboring City
description:
Many people like to travel to famous attractions, has been preset with a busy schedule. That makes you miss many amazing places that few people know . This's may be the first time you come to Vietnam or more, but you still wish to find something special or simply a trip to somewhere you never know in Vietnam. You do not have time to think about planning how to travel, how much money each place, what to prepare. In your mind there is one thing that you want an amazing trip. You have some crazy thinkings such as how to travel by motorcycle or how to bake potatoes. You do not like stay in luxury restaurants, try expensive food items. You just want to have dynamic tourist-style and you love street food.
So let me be your travel partner. You only need to prepare luggage only, everything remains - let me do! :)
